title: Cyclocross
name: Cyclocross
description:
A Map by Bce

Race venues, practice spots, cross hangouts.  This is a map for anything related to cyclocross.

See http://race.cx/2006/09/14/cyclocross-atlas/

properties.name: 'Cross Practice
properties.description: Posted by CbnystromMontgomery Rd, Elkridge, MD\'Cross workout every Wednesday @ 6pm on a 2km practice loop.

properties.name: 2005/2006 Cyclocross Nationals Venue
properties.description: Posted by BceCold, snowy venue of the 2005/2006 US cyclocross nationals.

properties.name: Arastradero Preserve
properties.description: Posted by SuperprestigeA preserve a few miles south of Palo Alto, Arastradero Preserve is a popular meeting spot for training on early season evenings before it gets too dark. There are multiple trails so it\'s possible to make several different loops for seudo races. "The Bowl" at the top of the park is a good place to practice dismounts/runups. The area is generally hilly so it\'s a good workout just to ride to the top and back.

properties.name: Brutal Climb
properties.description: Posted by Bce  Great strength building offroad climb. Get off and run on the steep sections for a true cross practice. Try not to puke when you hit 53rd. Continue up to Skyline via 53rd, and then drop back down into Forrest park on Saltzman.

properties.name: Crocker Amazon Park
properties.description: Posted by SuperprestigeThe Location of two DFL races and the third Bay Area Super Prestige race in 2006. The DFL races concentrated in the easterly portion which is definitely more bumpy and unpredictable. The BASP race also encompsed the playing fields to the west whcih introduced some grass into the course.

properties.name: Cross Crusade #1
properties.description: Posted by BceAlpenrose plays host to a favorite Cross Crusade course every year. Killer run up. Race through a weird fake dairy town. Get the velodrome a little muddy and race this amazing course. http://www.crosscrusade.com/flyers/2006/october_1.html Also home to Sellwood Cycles\' famous cross clinic: http://www.obra.org/flyers/2006/cross_clinics.html

properties.name: Cross Crusade #3
properties.description: Posted by Bce21277 NW Brunswick Canyon Rd, North Plains, OregonNew venue this year. They also do weddings.

properties.name: Cross Crusade #4
properties.description: Posted by Bce23029 NW Flying M Rd, Yamhill, OregonAmazing course, really tough run ups. A great halloween venue.

properties.name: Cross Crusade #5
properties.description: Posted by Bce  19009 SE Barton Park Rd, Boring, OregonGravel, speed, and pinch flats. Bring your tubulars and keep it upright for this one.

properties.name: Cross Crusade #6
properties.description: Posted by Bce896 ne bunyard pl, estacada or 97023Cross crusade series finale. Fast course with lots of grass and off-camber sections. Make sure you have toe spikes!

properties.name: Cyclocross Practice
properties.description: Posted by Cbnystrom\'Cross workout every Wednesday @ 6pm on a 2km practice loop.

properties.name: Cyclocross Season Opener, 2006
properties.description: Posted by BceNys wins european cyclocross season opener.

properties.name: GP Neerpelt
properties.description: Posted by Bceneerpelt, belgium

properties.name: Golden Gate Park
properties.description: Posted by SuperprestigeThe location of the 4th round of the 2006 BASP and the USGP Clark Natwick race in 2005. Unfortunately I can\'t guarantee dollar bills in beer cans and roaring fans at the infamous corner after the run up unless a race is going on...

properties.name: Grassy diversion on the way home from work
properties.description: Posted by BceSteep, grassy, dirt runup that I sometimes work into my ride home from the office.

properties.name: Great training in Forrest Park
properties.description: Posted by Bce  Leif Erikson trail is a multi-purpose double track fireroad open to cyclists. Terrain is a mix of gravel and dirt, and meanders on for 11 miles until ending at Germantown Rd. Leif is a staple in every PDX crosser\'s training. Bring spare tubes, and please be courteous to runners and hikers.

properties.name: Home to CX Nats and countless other races
properties.description: Posted by Bce PIR was home to the 2003 and 2004 US cyclocross national championships. Lots of great bike racing happening here.

properties.name: Hood River Cross: Flyer and Results
properties.description: Posted by Bce Hot, dusty, and fast. Great opener to the oregon cross season. Results

properties.name: My Bike shop.
properties.description: Posted by Veloshop  211 SW 9th Ave 97205Yep, I own it. Barely paying the bills, barely paying for races.

properties.name: Nice training spot
properties.description: Posted by Bce  Very flat with a nice mix of dirt and gravel. 17 miles out and back, and very close to the beach. Be on the lookout for wild horses and hogs.

properties.name: Off the 205 bike path
properties.description: Posted by BceGreat course with lots of hills, runups, and sketchy gravel. You can get in a 6-8 minute lap here.

properties.name: Perfect training hill
properties.description: Posted by Bce  A mix of dirt, gravel, sweeping and sharp turns make Saltzman a great place to practice power climbing and high speed dirt descending. Please stay on the right side of the road.

properties.name: RIP Johnson Farm
properties.description: Posted by BceRIP Johnson Farm. You will be missed. Beware of loose emu.

properties.name: Race cyclocross on a landfill
properties.description: Posted by BceThe only cyclocross race in my hometown takes place on a landfill named Mt Trashmore. I can\'t make this stuff up. VA Beach is very flat, with Mt Trashmore being the highest point at 60ft above sea level. One time, many years ago, I rode my Specialized Hard Rock down the side of the landfill and into the ajoined runoff lake. In retrospect, probably not such a great idea :)

properties.name: Rockburn Branch Park
properties.description: Posted by System  Montgomery Rd, Elkridge, MDRockburn Branch Park

properties.name: Starcrossed Cyclocross Race
properties.description: Posted by BceRace cyclocross at night, around a velodrome! Great energy and good times at this race.

properties.name: Stone barriers
properties.description: Posted by BceSweet place to practice your cross barrier skills.

properties.name: Toyon and Eucalyptus Groves
properties.description: Posted by SuperprestigeSmall wooded area on the Standford campus that is good for creating very short loops. There are logs in the more heavily wooded parts that can be used to make temporary barriers, there are also some ditches and faster paved sections. Small area but is fun if you live in the area. Downside: totally flat.

properties.name: USGP #1 and #2
properties.description: Posted by BceThe Gran Prix of Gloucester is two days of national calibre races where competitors from all over the US, Canada & Europe converge to race in the most beautiful race course in North America.

properties.name: USGP #3
properties.description: Posted by Bce3100 logic drive, longmont, coHosted by xilinux.com

properties.name: USGP #4
properties.description: Posted by Bce1515 Greenbriar Blvd, boulder, coReal grass, smooth and fast.

properties.name: USGP Finale and Cross Crusade #2
properties.description: Posted by BceFlat, fast, euro style cross course.

properties.name: Veloshop
